import React, { Component } from 'react' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons } from '@/components/button' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import './index.scss' import IosBg from '../../assets/images/ios-bg.jpg' import WebBg from '../../assets/images/web-bg.jpg' class StepFive extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Segmentation', 'Scheduling', 'Overview'], } saveAndContinue = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.nextStep() } back = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.prevStep() } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } render() { const { steps } = this.state return (
Channel
Campaign Name
: value
Campaign Channel
: value
Campaign Type
: value
Messages
Android
Sample App • Summary • Now
Title
message
iOS
Sample App • Summary • Now
Title
message
Web
Title
message
Scheduling
Segmentation
Send Test Notification
Save Save as Draft ) } } export default StepFive
